title: Digital Asset Acquisition Manager
company_name: CÔNG TY CỔ PHẦN TẬP ĐOÀN HQ
job_description:
1. Procurement Management
Evaluate game accounts based on standardized criteria and internal tools.
Receive, process, and verify account quality after purchase.
Ensure a smooth and accurate procurement process according to company procedures.
2. Data Management & Cross-Department Coordination
Accurately record transaction details into the inventory management system.
Collaborate with Customer Support and Accounting teams to maintain a seamless flow from purchasing to payment and customer handling.
Work with the Business Development team to launch purchasing campaigns and attract new account sources.
3. Reporting & Performance Optimization
Coordinate and supervise the daily tasks of the purchasing team and submit regular reports.
Support internal training initiatives to improve team skills, performance, and ownership.
Collaborate with the Technology department to integrate automation and digital tools to optimize purchasing efficiency and reduce manual work.
requirements:
Tối thiểu 1 năm kinh nghiệm trong mảng thu mua, sourcing hoặc giao dịch sản phẩm số (ưu tiên ngành game).
Kỹ năng giao tiếp và đàm phán tốt.
Sử dụng thành thạo Google Sheets hoặc Excel.
Có kinh nghiệm quản lý team nhỏ là một lợi thế.
Tư duy phân tích, kỹ lưỡng, có tinh thần trách nhiệm và chịu được áp lực cao.
